text: Kamaghɨn, ia uari uan anababar tongɨn vaghvagha mɨsevezir fofozir gumaziba ko, gumazir dapanir aghuir gumazamiziba deravɨra me gɨfoziba, kɨ me ini. Kɨ me amɨsevezɨ, men marazi 1,000plan gumazamizibar garima, marazi 100plan garima, marazi 50plan garima, marazi 10plan gari. Ezɨ kɨ uaghan gumazir ekiar maba bar ian anababar tongɨn vaghvagha me amɨsefe.
